_header: When I think on doomsday full sore I me a-dread

BodDig86.First Lines:
Uuen I þenke on domesdai wel sore mai me dredeÞer shal
                    affter his werc eueric fongen mede…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…ffor his holie nome and for hire swete herendingeÞat hoe
                    houre soule in to heuene bringe amen
BodDig86.Note:
Omitting stanzas 7, 12-15, but adding two stanzas between 10 and
                    11.

BLCottCalAIX.First Lines: Hƿenne ich þenche of domes daiFul sore mie adrede…
BLCottCalAIX.Last Lines: …For his holi nome and for hire herendingeþat heo ure saƿle to heouen ge bringe
